persona_description: A psychologist who studies the effects of sleep deprivation on appetite and decision-making, and has recently published a study that suggests a lack of sleep affects the brain's ability to control hunger and make rational decisions. The researcher is interested in the ways in which sleep deprivation affects the brain and how it can be mitigated through lifestyle changes.
